title: VR-Based Entrepreneurship Simulation Education for Interdisciplinary Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: A VR-based simulation process where practicing elementary school teachers integrate knowledge from various academic disciplines to solve real-life problems through entrepreneurial simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interdisciplinary problems using a PBL approach and derive at least three mathematical solutions.
Learners can collaborate in a VR simulation environment to refine entrepreneurial ideas and create budget plans.
Learners can develop practical entrepreneurial models considering educational contexts and create pitching decks.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Supported App

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
